APP.TITLE: Luis Medina App
APP.DESCRIPTION: Portfolio Application of Luis José Medina Sandoval.

PRESENTATIONS.TITLE: Luis José Medina Sandoval
PRESENTATIONS.DESCRIPTION: I am a computer engineer and software developer with three years of work experience, including managing corporate software. I am very determined, analytical, and assertive, and I am passionate about learning and solving complex problems.
PRESENTATIONS.GITHUB_DESCRIPTION: Here you will find a glimpse of my personal and professional projects. From a young age, I was fascinated by computers, understanding them, and enjoying creating programs that solved problems. Now, I have turned that passion into my professional career.
PRESENTATIONS.LINKEDIN_DESCRIPTION: If you would like more information about my projects, work experience, or any other topic, please don't hesitate to visit my profile on LinkedIn. There you will find all the necessary information to help you feel informed and comfortable.
PRESENTATIONS.CV_DESCRIPTION: Click here to download my resume and get detailed information about my work experiences, skills, and notable projects.
PRESENTATIONS.PROJECTS_DESCRIPTION: Throughout my professional and academic career, I have developed several projects that I will be presenting to you below.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Explore my experience in software development and web solutions throughout my career path. In the section below, you will find details about the most notable projects I have worked on.

CALL_TO_ACTION.TITLE: Have You Got Something In Mind?
CALL_TO_ACTION.DESCRIPTION: Worry Less, Achieve More: Let me help you turn your ideas into reality.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills and Technologies
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: As a professional, I have acquired a wide range of skills and experience with various technologies.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: CONNECT WITH ME
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Do you have a project in mind? Do you want to discuss an idea or share your opinion? Don't hesitate to contact me. I'm here to listen, address your concerns, and work together toward success. I look forward to hearing from you!
CONTACT.SUCCESS_TEXT: “Thank you for your message! I'm delighted to hear from you. I look forward to working together towards success!

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: I am a computer engineer and software developer with three years of work experience, including managing corporate software.

Plataforma Crowdfunding.TITLE: Crowdfunding Platform
Plataforma Crowdfunding.DESCRIPTION: A crowdfunding website based on donations to easily manage payments across various platforms and promote social impact projects in Venezuela, aiming to support and bring visibility to people from low-income backgrounds facing need, vulnerability, and other social causes.
Plataforma Crowdfunding.NOTE: Note: Data may be slow to load for the first time, due to limitations on the API host.

Romano's Pizza System.TITLE: Romano's Pizza System
Romano's Pizza System.DESCRIPTION: A responsive web sales system for a pizzeria, featuring the entire product catalog and combos available from the franchise, providing an accessible interface for order processing, client management, and invoice printing.

SabedeSeguros Quoters.TITLE: SabedeSeguros Quoters
SabedeSeguros Quoters.DESCRIPTION: A web application that provides responsive quote generators for different types of insurance was developed as a WordPress plugin, which can be easily added to the company website. It replaces the need for local Excel files.
SabedeSeguros Quoters.NOTE: Note: The live application runs on a demo page. Images reflect the project's original appearance and functionality on the company's now inactive website.

Luis Medina App.TITLE: Luis Medina App
Luis Medina App.DESCRIPTION: The current professional web portfolio with my work and capabilities.

Tomodachi App.TITLE: Tomodachi App
Tomodachi App.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive web platform for event management, facilitating ticket, stand, and sponsorship sales. It enables detailed event creation with itineraries, management of ticket types with promotions, and a billing and transaction system. It includes user and role management, along with a dashboard for administering attendees, exhibitors, and sponsors.

Cognitive Monitoring App.TITLE: Cognitive Monitoring App
Cognitive Monitoring App.DESCRIPTION: Mobile application developed as a technical test, focusing on the design and implementation of a cognitive monitoring dashboard using React Native. It includes modules for viewing progress, performance, and a user profile, offering an intuitive experience for tracking cognitive metrics.

Melissa Barba Real Estate.TITLE: Melissa Barba Real Estate
Melissa Barba Real Estate.DESCRIPTION: Modern, responsive landing page for real estate advisor Melissa Barba. Bilingual content (EN/ES) using i18next, section-based navigation, a property search form with validation and notifications, serverless function submission (Vercel), and dynamic SEO (OG/Twitter metadata) via a reusable component.

CP Global Insurance.TITLE: CP Global Insurance
CP Global Insurance.DESCRIPTION: Official website for CP Global Insurance (USA) with bilingual content (EN/ES). React + TypeScript SPA with routing for services and business lines; responsive design with Tailwind and accessible Radix components. Includes a language selector with auto-detection, a contact form validated with React Hook Form and toasts, direct call/WhatsApp links, technical SEO (OG/Twitter metadata and JSON‑LD), and deployment on Vercel with a custom domain.

All City Gold Website.TITLE: All City Gold Website
All City Gold Website.DESCRIPTION: Official website for All City Gold jewelry. Responsive landing page with section navigation, subtle animations, and featured collections. Includes a contact form with email sending via a serverless function (Maileroo), basic SEO (OG/Twitter metadata), and deployment on Vercel.

Sabe de Seguros | Desarrollo Web Full-St.TITLE: Sabe de Seguros | Full-Stack Web Development
Sabe de Seguros | Desarrollo Web Full-St.DESCRIPTION: At Sabe de Seguros from January to May 2024, I developed various responsive web quote generators for the company website through a custom WordPress plugin. Leveraging PHP, MySQL, Vue, and Vuetify, I efficiently integrated these quotes into the platform, utilizing WordPress’ content management capabilities to keep the website’s information up-to-date.

Universidad Rafael Belloso Chacín | Desa.TITLE: Rafael Belloso Chacin University | Full-Stack Web Development
Universidad Rafael Belloso Chacín | Desa.DESCRIPTION: At Rafael Belloso Chacin University from January to April 2024, I developed my undergraduate thesis project: a responsive web crowdfunding application. Using the frameworks FastAPI (Python), React, and Bootstrap, I built this web solution, focusing on creating an adaptable and user-friendly interface that is receptive to different devices.

Regalado Group: Bienes Raíces | Encargad.TITLE: Regalado Group: Real Estate | Network Department Manager
Regalado Group: Bienes Raíces | Encargad.DESCRIPTION: At Regalado Group: Real Estate, I served as the Network Department Manager from March 2022 to September 2023. In this role, I managed the company’s commercial website using Joomla CMS as the platform and PHP, HTML, and CSS programming languages. My responsibilities included general website management and updates, as well as administration of properties in the system and corporate data.

SysModelers | Desarrollo Web Front-end.TITLE: SysModelers | Front-End Web Development
SysModelers | Desarrollo Web Front-end.DESCRIPTION: As a Front-end Web Developer at SysModelers from August 2021 to February 2022, I crafted engaging and accessible UI components using React and CoreUI. This enabled me to build modular, efficient, accessible, and user-centric web applications.

Romano's Pizza | Desarrollo Web Full-Sta.TITLE: Romano's Pizza | Full-Stack Web Development
Romano's Pizza | Desarrollo Web Full-Sta.DESCRIPTION: At Romano’s Pizza from July 2021 to November 2022, I spearheaded the development of a customized point-of-sale web application. Leveraging my custom PHP-based framework, along with MySQL, Vue.js, and Vuetify, I designed and implemented a tailored solution that met the specific needs of the restaurant

Corretaje de Seguros ASECA | Gestor de c.TITLE: ASECA Insurance Broker | Excel Quote Manager
Corretaje de Seguros ASECA | Gestor de c.DESCRIPTION: At ASECA Insurance Broker, I worked as an Excel Quote Manager from July 2021 to May 2024. In this role, I was responsible for creating and maintaining Excel files for quotations of international, national, and regional insurance policies. My responsibilities included ensuring the accuracy and constant updating of these quotes, which allowed the company to offer its clients an efficient tool for evaluating different coverage plans.
